bug.author: alissiawells
bug.description:
My module, based on deeppavlov, runs on my machine. However, it does not work on a remote server with Ubuntu 18.04 because of tarfile.ReadError. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35057128/85176100-aeb76000-b281-11ea-97e7-b0b74810a5d8.jpeg></denchmark-link>
I use deeppavlov of 0.8.0 version with small modifications: github.com/alissiawells/deeppavlov (treshold instead of modelâ€™s verdict in the output)

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alissiawells>@alissiawells</denchmark-link> , This is most likely related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepmipt/DeepPavlov/issues/1109>#1109</denchmark-link> (it will be fixed in the next release) as the console shows 2.76 KB downloaded while the file itself is about 5 MB. There may be a typo in the download link or some troubles with network. You can try and download and extract the file with other methods.
